tclibrary.name: JSP 标签
tclibrary.desc: 所有 Java ServerPages 标签的集合。
tclibrary.category: <element name="page" value='<%@ page %>' reference='JSP,page Directive'/> <element name="include" value='<%@ include file=""%>' reference='JSP,include Directive'/> <element name="taglib" value='<%@ taglib %>' reference='JSP,taglib Directive'/>

<element name="Declaration" value='<%! %>' reference='JSP,Declaration'/> <element name="Scriptlet" value='<% %>' reference='JSP,Scriptlet'/> <element name="Expression" value='<%= %>' reference='JSP,Expression'/>

<element name="jsp:setProperty" value='' reference='JSP,jsp:setProperty'/> <element name="jsp:getProperty" value='' reference='JSP,jsp:getProperty'/> <element name="jsp:useBean" value='' reference='JSP,jsp:useBean'/> <element name="jsp:forward" value='' reference='JSP,jsp:forward'/> <element name="jsp:plugin" value='' reference='JSP,jsp:plugin'/> <element name="jsp:param" value='' reference='JSP,jsp:param'/> <element name="jsp:include" value='' reference='JSP,jsp:include'/> <element name="" value='' reference='JSP,jsp:params'/>
